levels.description:
Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Attacks deal damage twice, apply this unit's Trait effect to all enemies within range and create a layer of sticky liquid within Attack Range that lasts for {attack@projectile_life_time} seconds. Ground enemies passing over the sticky liquid have Movement Speed <@ba.vup>{attack@move_speed:0%}</> and DEF <@ba.vup>{attack@def}</> (Does not stack). 
<@ba.rem>Skill activation grants {attack@trigger_time} ammo (each attack consumes 2 ammo) and the skill ends when all ammo is used (Can manually deactivate skill)</>
